With experience in large and complex organisations, including within government-owned or regulated environments, you bring a thoughtful balance of process discipline, analytical rigour and strategic insights. You take pride in mentoring others, developing high-performing teams, and fostering curiosity and confidence within the budgeting function. Technically, you bring advanced financial modelling and analytical skills, and are proficient in tools such as Excel, Power BI, SQL, and SAP. Most importantly, you’re an engaging storyteller who can distil complexity into clarity, influence decisions, and align financial insight with CS Energy’s broader purpose — to deliver affordable, reliable, and sustainable energy for Queenslanders.

CS Energy is a proudly Queensland-owned energy company playing a leading role in the state’s energy transition. You will join a collaborative, forward-thinking finance leadership team that values curiosity, authenticity, and continuous improvement. In return, you’ll be empowered to shape a function that delivers insight, innovation, and measurable value.
